entry: Our work on a learning-based flash translation layer LeaFTL has been accepted by ASPLOS '23.
Our research on a learning-based storage harvesting framework BlockFlex has been accepted by OSDI '22.
Our workshop paper on redesigning data centers for renewable energy has been accepted by HotNets '21.
Our research on a crash-consistency testing framework for HPC storage has been accepted by SC '21.
I started my internship at Microsoft Research.
